short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows you to specify a hex color on the Aisle Planner palettes page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Aisle Planner is a popular event planning website. One important feature is the ability to create a color palette for the event using a color picker wheel. This is definitely a helpful feature and this extension makes this process better by providing a place to input a hex code rather than having to rely on clicking the color picker.
